articles.title: Thomas Bangalter explains the real reason for Daft Punk's split - Mixmag
articles.description: The French producer spoke to the BBC about the pair parting ways in 2021
articles.content:
Thomas Bangalter, one of two founding members of Daft Punk, has spoken on the real reason for the duos split in 2021.
He chatted to the BBC in a recent interview, explaining that he and Daft Punks s… [+1749 chars]
